overview: PT. LOGAMINDO TEKNOLOGI INDONESIA is a logistic Company or shipment goods service which is existed since March 2018. As a company which is own an orientation to be the best.
description: We support our customer in every step of the supply chain, from consulting concept developing cost comparison method, project planning to the realization of all mutual set goal. These include the management of a consignment warehouse. We take over many tasks that are normally the core competency of our client. This kind of execution improve all business process, increase productivity and quality, facilities, administration and reduce cost. Our customers competitive ability is significantly raised.
